title: Compiling an empty and non-existent file should be handled properly

labels.name: SciPy
labels.description: issues related to enable LFortran to compile the entire FORTRAN codebase in SciPy

body:
*Original issue*: https://gitlab.com/lfortran/lfortran/-/issues/738

There are two bugs.

A non-existent file should be reported immediately as an error that the file does not exist.


An empty file should produce and empty ASR (I think). Currently a non-existent file is treated as an existing empty file, and it triggers a bug
for example on our fixedform branch:
